title: Fatal attraction
creator_credit: Adrian Lyne, Sherry Lansing, Stanley R. Jaffe and Paramount Pictures
brief_description: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer star in this gripping, if at times inconsistent thriller. A passionate week-end encounter ends Dan Gallagher’s perfect life. Alex refuses to be a woman scorned and her capacity for revenge and violence is without limit. The conclusion is unforgettably shattering as the nightmare draws to its inevitable “bloody” climax. Glenn Close gives an excellent, terrifying performance as the homicidal Alex as the film grapples with men’s subconscious fears about women.

constellations_other.name: Femme fatales to fembots
constellations_other.description: When women gain power, men get scared. You can see this in the mysterious, seductive and deadly femme fatale. Using her sexuality and intellect to manipulate, control and co-opt power, the femme fatale reflects prevailing attitudes to women.
